overview: Abigail Mac is a sexy bartender trying to catch the eye of her dream guy and failing miserably. Feeling desperate, she turns to her bar buddies for help and gets a lot more than she bargained for. With a rocky romance, great chemistry, and steamy sex, Love On The Rocks will rock your boat (and whoever is in it with you!)
tagline: A Young Couple's Journey From Rock Bottom To True Love.
title: Love On The Rocks
